      • waitWhilePaused

        public void waitWhilePaused()
        Description copied from interface: StepDebugLogic
        If we are currently in pause mode, then block, waiting for us to enter step or run mode. Then, if we are in step mode, set the debugger back to pause mode.
        Specified by:
        waitWhilePaused in interface StepDebugLogic
